metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2561 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpMyAdmin 4.4.xbefore 4.4.15.5 and 4.5.x before 4.5.5.1 allow remote authenticated usersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) normalization.php or (2)js/normalization.js in the database normalization page, (3)templates/database/structure/sortable_header.phtml in the databasestructure page, or (4) the pos parameter to db_central_columns.php in thecentral columns page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.0-2').
